name: Get It Out!
description:
This game was made in 7 days for the Blackthornprod game jam 3.

You play as a hoarder who's girlfriend is coming over in just a few minutes. She demanded he get rid of his stuff. Surprised by her heading over, he panics and starts throwing out his stuff in whatever way is possible. Into trash cans, into other rooms, into the oven, out windows, by whatever means necessary.

This game is about how quickly you can clear out the hoarder's home. It'll save your best time until you close the game. Please comment your best times. I've been able to clear the game in almost 1 minute.
